titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which limit the deductibility of contributions to individual retirement accounts.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/18/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to repeal provisions which limited the income tax deduction for contributions to individual retirement accounts. Specifies that the Internal Revenue Code shall be applied and administered as if such provisions had not been enacted.
